title: Forecasting: Implement segment-weighted forecast totals using Customer_Analyzer fit tiers

sections.text: Add support in the forecasting aggregation pipeline to compute segment-weighted totals by applying configurable weights per Customer_Analyzer fit tier (e.g., A/B/C) to opportunity amounts/probabilities. Expose both raw and weighted totals via the forecast API so the UI can render weighted views without duplicating logic. Ensure weighting works across existing scenario buckets (baseline/commit/best-case) and falls back gracefully when fit tier is missing.
